name: The Lair of The Beholder
description:
With glory and treasure in mind  you journeyed into the old dungeon Zindan. After days of exploring, fighting and looting you were captured in your sleep by cultists. Shortly after they decided to sacrifice you and threw you into The Lair of The Beholder. There is only one way to escape the demons lair. Will you be able to escape? Or will you share the fate of many others before you...

Art by: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
